content: In 2025, Stenograd hums with quiet control under the watchful eye of the Behavioral Compliance Index, a system that shapes every life through invisible scores. After its architect Marek Halden is found dead, the city shudders—subtle glitches creep in, stirring unease. Lenart Kova, a quiet engineer, weaves clues into a popular puzzle app, guiding citizens to secret caches that reveal the names of those erased by the system. Curiosity turns into outrage as protesters flood the streets, fueled by Nikola Petrak’s daring leak of Council selection files that expose the Council’s rigged rise to power. Accusations fly, show trials erupt, and administrators defect, spilling secrets. Desperate, the Council offers televised transparency, but citizens quickly spot the fabrications and unite in subtle rebellion, undermining BCI’s grip and lighting the path to a new, uncertain future.
